description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Pictorial History of the Civil War in the United States of America. By B. J. Lossing. Illustrated by many hundred engravings on wood, by Lossing and Barritt, etc" Author: LOSSING, Benson John. Contributor: BARRITT, W. - Artist Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9603.ee.7." Volume: 03 Page: 358 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1866 Publisher: George W. Childs Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002263922 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
